import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; import "../../../styles/Machine/Machine.scss"; import MachineContrl from "../../../components/Machine/MachineContrl"; import MachineTemp from "../../../components/Machine/MachineTemp"; import "../../../styles/ReplenishmentManagement/replenishmentOrder.scss"; function MachineSettings() { const history = useHistory(); //檢視用的狀態 const [checking, setChecking] = useState(null); //切換回報狀態的狀態 const [returnBtn, setReturnBtn] = useState(false); //取消異常用的按鈕 const [cancelBtn, setCancelBtn] = useState(true); //取消異常用的子按鈕 const [cancelBtnCheck, setCancelBtnCheck] = useState(false); //異常回報按鈕的狀態切換 const onReturnBthHandle = () => { setReturnBtn(!returnBtn); }; const onCancelBtn = () => { setCancelBtn(!cancelBtn); }; //取消按鈕的子按鈕狀態切換 const onCancelBtnCheck = () => { setCancelBtnCheck(!cancelBtnCheck); }; return (
